description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾任中共中央政治局主席、中共中央总书记。因出身工人阶级而被共产国际提拔，但实际领导权多由周恩来、李立三等人掌握。1931年在上海被国民政府逮捕后迅速叛变并被处决。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), serving as Chairman of the CCP Central Politburo and General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee. He was promoted by the Comintern due to his working-class background, but actual leadership was often held by others like Zhou Enlai and Li Lisan. After his arrest by the Nationalist government in Shanghai in 1931, he quickly defected and was executed.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人和早期领导人，是向忠发的前任中共中央总书记。
description.en: A founder and early leader of the Chinese Communist Party, and Xiang Zhongfa's predecessor as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，在向忠发死后接任中共中央总负责人。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party who took over as the head of the CCP after Xiang Zhongfa's death.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Xiang Zhongfa.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发被处决的地点。
description.en: The location where Xiang Zhongfa was executed.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1923年由中国共产党领导的京汉铁路工人大罢工，向忠发是参与者和组织者之一。
description.en: A major strike by workers on the Jinghan Railway in 1923, led by the Chinese Communist Party, in which Xiang Zhongfa was a participant and organizer.

description.zh-cn: 湖北省的工人组织，向忠发曾任委员长。
description.en: A workers' organization in Hubei Province, where Xiang Zhongfa once served as chairman.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，向忠发曾任主席。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party, of which Xiang Zhongfa was once chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期由中国国民党领导的中央政府，于1931年逮捕并处决了向忠发。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China led by the Kuomintang, which arrested and executed Xiang Zhongfa in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期工人运动领袖，向忠发的入党介绍人。
description.en: An early labor movement leader of the Chinese Communist Party who introduced Xiang Zhongfa to the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾在湖北省总工会担任向忠发的副手。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party who served as Xiang Zhongfa's deputy at the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾在湖北省总工会担任向忠发的副手。
description.en: A former major leader of the CCP and PRC, who served as Xiang Zhongfa's deputy at the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾在向忠发担任总书记期间掌握实权，推行“立三路线”。
description.en: An early leader of the CCP who held effective power during Xiang Zhongfa's tenure as General Secretary and promoted the 'Lisan Line'.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会
en: 5th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 1927年中国共产党在武汉召开的全国代表大会，向忠发在此次会议上当选为中共中央委员，进入中央领导层。
description.en: The National Congress of the CCP held in Wuhan in 1927, where Xiang Zhongfa was elected to the CCP Central Committee, entering the central leadership.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第五届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第五届中央委员会
en: 5th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中共五大选举产生的中央委员会，向忠发是委员之一。
description.en: The Central Committee elected at the 5th National Congress of the CCP, of which Xiang Zhongfa was a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，曾在向忠发之前担任中共最高领导人，后被派回国纠正李立三路线。
description.en: An early top leader of the CCP, who served as the highest leader before Xiang Zhongfa and was later sent back to China to correct the Lisan Line.

description.zh-cn: 1927年中共中央在汉口召开的紧急会议，向忠发在此次会议上被选为临时中央政治局委员。
description.en: An emergency meeting held by the CCP Central Committee in Hankou in 1927, where Xiang Zhongfa was elected a member of the temporary Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际性的共产党组织，在中共早期对其有巨大影响，并支持向忠发成为中共最高领导人。
description.en: An international communist organization that had a significant influence on the early CCP and supported Xiang Zhongfa's rise to top leadership.

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导人，曾接见并表示重视向忠发，推动了其在党内的晋升。
description.en: Leader of the Soviet Union who met with and showed appreciation for Xiang Zhongfa, promoting his advancement within the party.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际领导人，在中共六大上对向忠发表示赞同。
description.en: A Comintern leader who expressed approval of Xiang Zhongfa at the 6th National Congress of the CCP.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第六次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第六次全国代表大会
en: 6th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 1928年中国共产党在莫斯科召开的全国代表大会，向忠发在此次会议后当选为中共中央总书记。
description.en: The National Congress of the CCP held in Moscow in 1928, after which Xiang Zhongfa was elected General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。在向忠发担任名义领袖期间，周恩来是中共的实际负责人之一。
description.en: A former major leader of the CCP and PRC. During Xiang Zhongfa's nominal leadership, Zhou Enlai was one of the actual leaders of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾任中央政治局常委，后被向忠发和李立三排挤出中央领导核心。
description.en: An early leader of the CCP and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, who was later pushed out of the central leadership by Xiang Zhongfa and Li Lisan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，共产国际派遣回国后，逐渐取代向忠发成为中共实际领导人。向忠发死后代理总书记。
description.en: An early leader of the CCP. After being sent back to China by the Comintern, he gradually replaced Xiang Zhongfa as the de facto leader of the CCP. He served as acting General Secretary after Xiang's death.

description.zh-cn: 一名妓女，后成为向忠发的情妇并与其同居。
description.en: A prostitute who became Xiang Zhongfa's mistress and lived with him.

description.zh-cn: 原中共中央特科负责人，1931年被捕叛变，导致包括向忠发在内的大量中共地下党员被捕。
description.en: Former head of the CCP's special service (Teke) who was arrested and defected in 1931, leading to the arrest of many underground CCP members, including Xiang Zhongfa.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。据称向忠发曾提名他担任中华苏维埃共和国主席，为其政治发展提供了机会。
description.en: The principal founder of the CCP and the PRC. Xiang Zhongfa reportedly nominated him as Chairman of the Chinese Soviet Republic, providing an opportunity for his political advancement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党创始人和早期领导人之一。向忠发曾反对共产国际任命其担任苏区中央局书记。
description.en: A founder and early leader of the CCP. Xiang Zhongfa opposed the Comintern's appointment of him as the secretary of the Soviet Area Central Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国革命根据地建立的政权，向忠发曾提名毛泽东担任其临时中央政府主席。
description.en: A state established by the CCP in its revolutionary base areas. Xiang Zhongfa nominated Mao Zedong as the chairman of its provisional central government.

description.zh-cn: 国民党重要人物，与顾顺章一同策划并逮捕了向忠发。
description.en: An important figure in the Kuomintang who, along with Gu Shunzhang, planned and arrested Xiang Zhongfa.

description.zh-cn: 时任淞沪警备司令，在接到蒋介石命令后下令处决向忠发。
description.en: Then commander of the Shanghai Garrison, who ordered the execution of Xiang Zhongfa upon receiving orders from Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 时任国民政府领导人，下令“就地枪决”向忠发。
description.en: Then leader of the Nationalist Government who ordered the immediate execution of Xiang Zhongfa on the spot.

description.zh-cn: 任弼时的妻子，因向忠发叛变供出其住址而被捕。
description.en: Wife of Ren Bishi, who was arrested after Xiang Zhongfa betrayed her location upon his capture.

description.zh-cn: 中共党员，因向忠发叛变供出其所在的机要处地址而被捕。
description.en: A CCP member who was arrested after Xiang Zhongfa betrayed the location of the secretarial office where he was.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 在中共六大后，向忠发当选为中央政治局主席兼中央政治局常委会主席，党内习惯称之为“总书记”。
description.en: After the 6th National Congress of the CCP, Xiang Zhongfa was elected Chairman of the Central Politburo and its Standing Committee, a position customarily referred to within the party as 'General Secretary'.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府特务于1931年6月22日逮捕向忠发，并于24日将其处决。
description.en: Nationalist Government agents arrested Xiang Zhongfa on June 22, 1931, and executed him on the 24th.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发参与并组织了京汉铁路大罢工。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa participated in and organized the Jinghan Railway Strike.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，刘少奇是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Liu Shaoqi was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，李立三是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Li Lisan was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 在向忠发担任湖北省总工会委员长期间，项英是其副委员长。
description.en: While Xiang Zhongfa was Chairman of the Hubei Provincial General Labor Union, Xiang Ying was his Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 许白昊介绍向忠发加入中国共产党。
description.en: Xu Baihao introduced Xiang Zhongfa to join the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发在中共五大上当选为中央委员，进入中共中央领导层。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa was elected to the Central Committee at the 5th National Congress of the CCP, entering the party's central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际出于加强领导层工人成分的考虑，支持并提拔向忠发成为中共最高领导人。
description.en: The Comintern, seeking to strengthen the working-class composition of the leadership, supported and promoted Xiang Zhongfa to become the top leader of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林在苏联接见了向忠发，并对其表示重视，这促进了向忠发的政治崛起。
description.en: Stalin received Xiang Zhongfa in the Soviet Union and showed appreciation for him, which facilitated Xiang's political rise.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第六次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在共产国际的支持下，向忠发在中共六大后当选为中央政治局主席兼常委会主席，成为名义上的党内最高领导人。
description.en: With the support of the Comintern, Xiang Zhongfa was elected Chairman of the Central Politburo and its Standing Committee after the 6th National Congress of the CCP, becoming the nominal top leader of the party.

position.zh-cn: 中央常委、秘书长兼组织部长
position.en: Member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Secretary-General, and Head of the Organization Department

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在向忠发担任总书记期间担任中央常委、秘书长等职务，名义上是其下属，但实际上是中共的核心领导者之一。
description.en: During Xiang Zhongfa's tenure as General Secretary, Zhou Enlai served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary-General. Although nominally his subordinate, Zhou was one of the actual core leaders of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 在李立三提议下，向忠发赞成并主持会议通过决议，取消了蔡和森的中央政治局委员、常委及宣传部长职务。
description.en: At Li Lisan's suggestion, Xiang Zhongfa approved and presided over a meeting that passed a resolution to remove Cai Hesen from his positions as a member of the Politburo, its Standing Committee, and Head of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 在周恩来前往苏联期间，向忠发听信李立三的建议，推行了“立三路线”的冒险主义政策。
description.en: While Zhou Enlai was in the Soviet Union, Xiang Zhongfa heeded Li Lisan's advice and implemented the adventurist policies of the 'Lisan Line'.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣周恩来和瞿秋白回国，在中共六届三中全会上纠正了李立三的错误路线。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Zhou Enlai and Qu Qiubai back to China, where they corrected Li Lisan's erroneous line at the Third Plenum of the 6th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 共产国际派遣周恩来和瞿秋白回国，在中共六届三中全会上纠正了李立三的错误路线。
description.en: The Comintern dispatched Zhou Enlai and Qu Qiubai back to China, where they corrected Li Lisan's erroneous line at the Third Plenum of the 6th CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发与妓女杨秀贞姘居。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa cohabited with the prostitute Yang Xiuzhen.

description.zh-cn: 顾顺章于1931年4月被捕叛变，其提供的情报最终导致向忠发于6月22日被捕。
description.en: Gu Shunzhang was arrested and defected in April 1931. The intelligence he provided ultimately led to Xiang Zhongfa's arrest on June 22.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发曾提名被解除军权的毛泽东担任中华苏维埃共和国临时中央政府主席，为毛泽东日后的政治发展提供了机会。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa nominated Mao Zedong, who had been stripped of military power, to be the Chairman of the Provisional Central Government of the Chinese Soviet Republic, providing an opportunity for Mao's future political development.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发反对共产国际远东局让张国焘出任苏区中央局书记的计划。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa opposed the Comintern Far Eastern Bureau's plan to appoint Zhang Guotao as the secretary of the Soviet Area Central Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发被捕后，时任国民政府领导人蒋介石下达了“就地枪决”的命令。
description.en: After Xiang Zhongfa's arrest, Chiang Kai-shek, then leader of the Nationalist Government, issued the order to 'execute on the spot'.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发被捕后随即叛变，供出了陈琮英的住址，导致其被捕。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa defected immediately after his arrest and revealed Chen Congying's address, leading to her capture.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发被捕后随即叛变，供出了中共中央机要处的地址，导致张纪恩被捕。
description.en: Xiang Zhongfa defected immediately after his arrest and revealed the address of the CCP Central Committee's secretarial office, leading to the capture of Zhang Ji'en.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发在中共六大后接替陈独秀（及其后的瞿秋白），成为中共最高领导人。
description.en: After the 6th National Congress of the CCP, Xiang Zhongfa succeeded Chen Duxiu (and his successor Qu Qiubai) to become the top leader of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 向忠发死后，经王明短暂代理，博古正式接任中共中央总负责人。
description.en: After Xiang Zhongfa's death and a brief acting period by Wang Ming, Bo Gu formally took over as the head of the CCP Central Committee.
